Imports System
Imports System.ComponentModel
Imports System.Data
Imports #Namespace##Class#Service

#BeginNamespace#

    ''' <summary>
    ''' Service client code (generated by DataTierGeneratorPlus), to call service client proxy reference (generated by Visual Studio / svcutil).
    ''' </summary>
    Public NotInheritable Class #Class#ServiceClientApplication
        Private Sub New()
        End Sub
        ''' <summary>
        ''' Sample service client application code
        ''' </summary>
        Public Shared Sub Test()
            Dim masterList As BindingListView(Of #Class#Service.#Class#Contract) = Nothing
            '#Class#Service.#Class#Contract masterInfo = default(#Class#Service.#Class#Contract);
            Dim #ClassVariable#Client As New #Class#Service.#Class#ServiceClient()

            #ClassVariable#Client.Open()

            'call service methods here, using opened service client
            masterList = #ClassVariable#Client.SelectInfoAll().ToBindingListViewOfContract()

            If (#ClassVariable#Client.State <> System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed) Then
                #ClassVariable#Client.Close()
            End If
        End Sub
    End Class

#EndNamespace#
